about.Q1content: This website is a creative theme developed by Mina. About the intention, I like the design style of the website
about.Q1content1: and would like to refer it for practicing my front-end skills. I change some style in this website, not total same to the reference website. This is also the second creative theme in my portfolio. If you like, please tell me.
about.Q2content1: Hi, this is Mina, an ENTP creative girl. As a Back-end Software engineer, a Polyglot and a Blogger, my hobbits are software development, learning languages and researching fortune-telling, also I'm learning Front-end skills recently.
about.Q2content3: , you can refer it to know more about me.
about.Q3content: If you have any questions or feedback, please send mail: yuukoyu416@gmail.com

about.Q1content: 本網站是一個用來練習前端技術而開發的創意主題網站。起初是很喜歡
about.Q1content1: 的設計，所以希望能透過自己的技術將網站刻出做為練習，在開發過程有發展出自己額外的設計，跟原主題不完全相似，如果你喜歡的話，可以跟我說~
about.Q2content1: 嗨，我是Mina，一個ENTP的奇女子。我目前是軟體後端工程師+多語學習+部落客 (應該算吧)，興趣目前很喜歡亂創作一些網站，學習不同的外語跟研究命理占卜學。最近在玩轉前端工程。
about.Q3content: 如果您有任何疑問或回饋，可以寄信給我: yuukoyu416@gmail.com
